Name: Macroboy Y
About the game: Macroboy Y is a fast multiplayer platform and fighting game. Fights take place in dangerous, often vertical, arenas. Several characters with different characteristics and multiples weapons are available. It can be played from one to eight players. Default controls are: Arrow keys, F to shot, D to jump, S to dash, space for the map. Joysticks can be configured throught the input panel available from main menu.
